text: One day after RadarOnline. com published The National ENQUIRER ‘ s exclusive interview with Alex Rodriguez ‘ s mistress, Lauren Hunter, pals of the star are insisting that A - Rod hasn ’ t been in contact with Hunter for years. But Radar has obtained proof that Rodriguez and his assistant were emailing Lauren with travel details for a November 2016 sex date! A copy of Hunter ’ s flight itinerary for November 2, 2016, clearly states that it was provided to her by A - Rod ’ s assistant and the baseballer himself. READ The Itinerary Here These email exchanges, dated one day before Hunter ’ s flight, show discussion between Rodriguez and his assistant regarding Hunter ’ s flight details. “ Heidi — when is the return flight? ” Rodriguez wrote his assistant, Heidi Bitter
